dct_title_s: Perigrinatie ofte veertich-iarige reyse der kinderen IsraÃ«ls
dct_description_sm: met groote verbeteringe van nieuws geteeckent en uytgegeven door H.I.P. Keur, M. Doornick en P. Rotterdam ; D. Stoopendaal, fec. ; [Visscher].
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Bar scale on map given in "Uren gaens".
Shows topography, drainage, territories of the tribes of Israel, travel routes, places of historical interest.
Features a decorative title cartouche with illustrations of angels.
Features illustrations of ships, sea monster, 2 shekel coins, and compass rose.
